Council_Bluffs.Lewis and Clark Landing:
Lewis and Clark Landing is a public park located at 515 North Riverfront Drive in Downtown Omaha, Nebraska . This 23-acre (9.3 ha) park is situated along the eight-foot-tall (2.4 m) river walk of the Missouri River just north of U.S. Interstate 480.


== History ==
Lewis and Clark Landing is the original landing site of the 1804 Lewis and Clark Expedition.
